feed.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft

entry.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft
entry.summary: Ahmed responds to Russ's general points and questions by providing a link to the draft BIP. Milly Bitcoin discusses the potential need for gaining permissions for a license change to be considered effective, and proposes that miners be the main beneficiaries of licensing, with consideration on whether they should vote to adopt the new terms. Russ requests clarification on the purpose and benefits of a license for Core software or the blockchain, given the lack of clarity on who holds the license, enforcement mechanisms, and revenue sharing.
